Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Urinate \U"ri*nate\, v. i. [LL. urinare.] To discharge urine; to make water. [1913 Webster]

urinate v 1: pass after the manner of urine; "The sick men urinated blood" 2: eliminate urine; "Again, the cat had made on the expensive rug" [syn: {make}, {piddle}, {puddle}, {micturate}, {piss}, {pee}, {pee-pee}, {make water}, {relieve oneself}, {take a leak}, {spend a penny}, {wee}, {wee-wee}, {pass water}]
